en: Teachers must understand children.
zh: 老师必须了解孩子。

en: A teacher should never laugh at his students' mistakes.
zh: 老师不应该嘲笑学生的错误。

en: The teacher gave way to the students' demand.

en: The teacher had to evaluate all the students.
zh: 老师必须评估所有的学生。

en: Teachers stimulate the students' interest, have them think, ask questions, and debate among themselves.
zh: 老师激发学生的兴趣，让他们思考、提问，并在他们之间进行辩论。

en: The teacher accused one of his students of being noisy in class.
zh: 老师指责他的一个学生在课堂上吵闹。

en: The teacher was worried by Tom's frequent absence from class.

en: Teachers should occasionally let their students blow off some steam.

en: Teachers should treat all their students impartially.
zh: 老师应该公正地对待所有的学生。

en: Although teachers give a lot of advice, students don't always take it.
zh: 虽然老师给很多建议，但学生并不总是听取。

en: A teacher should never make fun of a pupil who makes a mistake.
zh: 老师不应该取笑犯错的学生。

en: The salary of a teacher is lower than that of a lawyer.

en: You should be respectful to your teachers.
zh: 你应该尊重你的老师。

en: I intended to have been a teacher.

en: I have been a teacher for 15 years.

en: Patience is essential for a teacher.

en: It is not fitting for a teacher to overly favor certain pupils over others.

en: A student raised his hand when the teacher finished the reading.

en: When the teacher is very strict, the students must mind their P's and Q's.

en: An ounce of practice is worth a pound of precept.
zh: 实践胜于雄辩。

en: The vicar often refers to the Bible in his sermon.

en: Houses should be built so as to admit plenty of light as well as fresh air.

en: We'll finish the work even if it takes us all day.
zh: 即使要花我们一整天的时间，我们也要完成这项工作。

en: We insist that this project be carried out immediately.
zh: 我们坚持立即执行这个项目。

en: We have a substantial stake in the venture.
zh: 我们在这项事业中拥有重大利益。

en: Our train went at 200 kilometers an hour.
zh: 我们的火车以每小时200公里的速度行驶。

en: We are cruising at an altitude of 39,000 feet.
zh: 我们以39,000英尺的高度巡航。

en: The purpose of our trip is to visit a new factory.
zh: 我们这次旅行的目的是参观一家新工厂。

en: Our trip was unattended by adventures.
zh: 我们的旅行没有发生什么冒险的事情。

en: The time has come for us to stand up.
zh: 现在是我们站起来的时候了。

en: Our interests conflict with theirs.
zh: 我们的利益与他们的利益相冲突。

en: What have you come here for?
zh: 你来这里做什么？

en: What has brought you here?
zh: 是什么风把你吹来的？

en: You don't know German, do you?
zh: 你不会说德语，是吧？

en: Do you not play tennis?
zh: 你不打网球吗？

en: You'd better go home as soon as possible.
zh: 你最好尽快回家。

en: You don't like chocolate, do you?
zh: 你不喜欢巧克力，是吗？

en: You have just done your homework.
zh: 你刚刚做完作业。

en: You should make sure of the fact without hesitation.
zh: 你应该毫不犹豫地确认事实。

en: You have been imposed upon.
zh: 你被人利用了。

en: You smoke far too much. You should cut back.
zh: 你抽烟太多了。你应该减少一点。

en: You've been had.
zh: 你被骗了。

en: You should give up smoking.
zh: 你应该戒烟。

en: You must give up smoking.
zh: 你必须戒烟。

en: It is best that you stop smoking.
zh: 你最好戒烟。

en: You should give up smoking and drinking.
zh: 你应该戒烟戒酒。

en: All you have to do is to obey my orders.
zh: 你所要做的就是服从我的命令。

en: All you have to do is wait for his arrival.
zh: 你所要做的就是等他来。

en: All you have to do is to wait.
zh: 你所要做的就是等待。

en: All you have to do is to join us.
zh: 你所要做的就是加入我们。

en: All you have to do is wash the dishes.
zh: 你所要做的就是洗碗。

en: You are to start at once.
zh: 你必须立刻开始。

en: You needn't have taken a taxi.
zh: 你本不必打车的。

en: You have only to touch the button.
zh: 你只需要碰一下按钮。

en: You have many books.
zh: 你有很多书。

en: You are very fortunate that you have such friends.
zh: 你很幸运有这样的朋友。

en: I'm taking a walk in a park.
zh: 我在公园里散步。

en: My hobby is to listen to music.
zh: 我的爱好是听音乐。

en: My hobby is listening to music.
zh: 我的爱好是听音乐。

en: No matter how much I consider it I do not understand.
zh: 无论我怎么考虑，我都不明白。

en: No matter how much I think about it, I can't understand it.
zh: 无论我怎么想，我都无法理解。

en: No matter how much I think about it, I don't understand it.
zh: 无论我怎么想，我都不明白。

en: If you are free, give me a hand.
zh: 如果你有空，帮我个忙。

en: I work even on Sunday.
zh: 我即使在星期天也工作。

en: I even work on Sundays.
zh: 我甚至在星期天也工作。

en: It happened a long time ago.
zh: 那是很久以前发生的事了。

en: Where have you been?
zh: 你去哪儿了？

en: It's been snowing all night.
zh: 下了一整夜的雪。

en: How come you know so much about Japanese history?
zh: 你怎么对日本历史了解这么多？

en: Could you turn on the light, please?
zh: 请你把灯打开好吗？

en: Turn right at the crossroad.
zh: 在十字路口向右转。

en: They forgot to lock the door.
zh: 他们忘了锁门。

en: He was born on July 28th, 1888.
zh: 他出生于1888年7月28日。

en: If you will come this way...
zh: 如果您往这边走...

en: How did your interview go?
zh: 你的面试怎么样？

en: I have to write a letter. Do you have some paper?
zh: 我得写封信。 你有纸吗？

en: Could you do me a favour please?
zh: 请你帮我个忙好吗？

en: She is mad at me.
zh: 她生我的气了。

en: I can't believe my eyes.
zh: 我简直不敢相信我的眼睛。

en: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth.
zh: 以眼还眼，以牙还牙。

en: "Do you have any siblings?" "No, I'm an only child."
zh: “你有兄弟姐妹吗？” “没有，我是独生子。”

en: I often think about the place where I met you.
zh: 我经常想起我和你相遇的地方。

en: I would like to go to the concert with you.
zh: 我想和你一起去听演唱会。

en: He'll be sure to smell a rat if I'm with you.
zh: 如果我和你在一起，他肯定会觉得不对劲。

en: I would prefer to speak to you in private.
zh: 我更喜欢私下和你谈谈。

en: You really are hopeless.
zh: 你真是没救了。

en: You two are the nucleus of the team.
zh: 你们两个是团队的核心。

en: I'll get something to drink for both of you.
zh: 我去给你们俩拿点喝的。

en: I don't like both of you going to such a place.
zh: 我不喜欢你们两个都去那种地方。

en: There is enough bread for all of you.
zh: 面包够你们所有人吃的。

en: Divide the cake among you three.
zh: 你们三个人分这块蛋糕。

en: You students are supposed to be diligent.
zh: 你们学生应该勤奋学习。

en: How old will you be next year?
zh: 明年你多大了？

en: You had better not start until they arrive.
zh: 他们没到之前，你最好不要开始。

en: You should pay attention to his story.
zh: 你应该注意听他的故事。

en: You must not smoke till you grow up.
zh: 你长大之前不能抽烟。

en: What are you learning from the teacher?
zh: 你从老师那里学到了什么？

en: You are young boys.
zh: 你们是年轻的男孩。

en: You belong to the next generation.
zh: 你们属于下一代。

en: You may swim now.
zh: 你们现在可以游泳了。

en: You are to hand in your assignments by Monday.
zh: 你们必须在星期一之前交作业。

en: You didn't need to hurry.
zh: 你没必要那么着急。

en: You must conform to the rules.
zh: 你必须遵守规则。

en: All of you did good work.
zh: 你们所有人都做得很好。

en: What do you learn at school?
zh: 你在学校学什么？

en: You should try to be more polite.
zh: 你应该尽量更有礼貌。

en: Better to be hated for who you are than loved for who you're not.
zh: 宁愿因为真实的自己而被讨厌，也不要因为虚假的自己而被爱。

en: It's lonely in the saddle since the horse died.
zh: 马死了，独自在马鞍上感觉很孤独。

en: My eyes are an ocean in which my dreams are reflected.
zh: 我的眼睛是一片海洋，我的梦想在其中倒映。

en: Look at me when I talk to you!
zh: 我跟你说话的时候看着我！

en: What would the world be without women?
zh: 如果没有女人，世界会变成什么样？

en: What if you gave a speech and nobody came?
zh: 如果你发表演讲，却没有人来，会怎么样？

en: I don't know what to say to make you feel better.
zh: 我不知道该说什么才能让你感觉好一点。

en: This is not my type.
zh: 这不是我喜欢的类型。

en: I was trying to kill time.
zh: 我当时在打发时间。

en: How did you come up with this crazy idea?
zh: 你是怎么想到这个疯狂主意的？

en: I'm tired.
zh: 我累了。

en: Who wants some hot chocolate?
zh: 谁想来点热巧克力？

en: Speak more slowly, please!
zh: 请说慢一点！

en: When do we arrive?
zh: 我们什么时候到达？

en: The check, please.
zh: 结账。

en: And what are we going to do?
zh: 然后我们要做什么？

en: I have a headache.
zh: 我头疼。

en: Where can one make a phone call?
zh: 哪里可以打电话？

en: I must admit that I snore.
zh: 我必须承认我打鼾。

en: Tonight we're going to church.
zh: 今晚我们要去教堂。

en: How are you? Did you have a good trip?
zh: 你好吗？旅途愉快吗？

en: I don't feel well.
zh: 我觉得不舒服。

en: Call the police!
zh: 报警！

en: It's too expensive!
zh: 太贵了！

en: She's faking sleep. That's why she's not snoring.
zh: 她在装睡。所以她才不打鼾。

en: Everybody wished he had been elected governor.
zh: 大家都希望他能当选州长。

en: Everyone opposed it, but they got married all the same.
zh: 虽然大家都反对，但他们还是结婚了。

en: A cellar was dug on top of the hill and they slowly moved the house from the road to the hill.
zh: 他们在山顶上挖了一个地窖，然后慢慢地把房子从路边移到了山上。

en: Everybody came to the class on time.
zh: 大家都按时来上课了。

en: The project was successful in the sense that it drew the attention of everyone.
zh: 这个项目之所以成功，是因为它引起了所有人的注意。

en: Is there enough food to go around?
zh: 食物够分吗？

en: I will see you, each in your turn.
zh: 我会依次见到你们每个人。

en: Let's extend our heartiest welcome to Miyake-san.
zh: 让我们向三宅先生表示最热烈的欢迎。

en: Each is good in its degree.
zh: 每个都有其优点。

en: Everybody was interested in the story.
zh: 大家都对这个故事很感兴趣。

en: Make sure that all of you arrive at nine.
zh: 确保你们所有人九点到达。

en: You are making history.
zh: 你们正在创造历史。

en: You don't have to trouble yourselves.
zh: 你们不必麻烦了。

en: You can enter the library freely.
zh: 你可以自由进入图书馆。

en: How is everyone?
zh: 大家好吗？

en: Are you creating for us a future world where there is a greater danger of skin cancer, weakened bodies, less food and fewer plants and animals?
zh: 你们是否正在为我们创造一个未来世界，在那里皮肤癌的危险更大，身体更虚弱，食物更少，动植物也更少？

en: With kind regards to you all.
zh: 谨向大家致以问候。

en: Ladies and gentlemen, please allow me to say a few words of welcome.
zh: 女士们，先生们，请允许我说几句欢迎词。

en: I will miss you all.
zh: 我会想念你们大家的。

en: I'll never forget having a good time with you all.
zh: 我永远不会忘记和大家一起度过的美好时光。

en: Ladies and gentlemen, please come this way.
zh: 女士们，先生们，请这边走。

en: Make yourselves comfortable.
zh: 请随意。

en: Please be quiet, everybody.
zh: 请大家安静。

en: I hope you are all well.
zh: 希望你们都好。

en: All aboard!
zh: 全体上车！

en: Please change your database to reflect the new address as follows.
zh: 请更改您的数据库，以反映以下新地址。

en: We are afraid that our new address is not registered on your database.
zh: 恐怕我们的新地址尚未在您的数据库中注册。

en: We are interested in your service.
zh: 我们对您的服务感兴趣。

en: We have considered your proposal, and we have decided that we are not able to reduce the price.
zh: 我们已经考虑了您的提议，并且我们决定无法降低价格。

en: In reply to your request, we offer you an extra discount of 5% on this order.
zh: 回复您的请求，我们在此订单上为您提供额外的5％折扣。

en: We have given your order highest priority.
zh: 我们已将您的订单列为最高优先级。

en: I would appreciate it if you could reserve a room at a convenient location for visiting your office.
zh: 如果您能在方便访问您办公室的地点预订房间，我将不胜感激。

en: We appreciate the opportunity you've given us to learn more about your organization.
zh: 感谢您给我们提供的机会，让我们更多地了解您的组织。

en: We would like to ask your help in clearing up our financial problems with your company.
zh: 我们希望您能帮助我们解决与贵公司的财务问题。

en: I would like to come and see you.
zh: 我想来拜访您。

en: Any orders you place with us will be processed promptly.
zh: 您向我们下的任何订单都将得到及时处理。

en: Please inform us as to what quantity you can deliver at regular intervals.
zh: 请告知我们您能定期交付多少数量。

en: Here is our answer to your fax message dated April 1st.
zh: 这是我们对您4月1日传真信息的答复。

en: We believe that you will be able to make a price concession.
zh: 我们相信您将能够做出价格让步。

en: Please do not touch the record side.
zh: 请勿触摸唱片面。

en: Records certify that Bob passed his driving test.
zh: 记录证明鲍勃通过了驾驶考试。

en: The monument was set up in the park.
zh: 纪念碑被安置在公园里。

en: On top of the statue, Sadako is holding a golden crane over her head.
zh: 在雕像的顶部，佐佐木祯子头顶举着一只金色的鹤。

en: The commemorative ceremony ended with the closing address.
zh: 纪念仪式以闭幕词结束。

en: The press besieged the minister with questions.
zh: 记者们用问题包围了部长。

en: Reporters do not hesitate to intrude into people's privacy.
zh: 记者毫不犹豫地侵犯人们的隐私。

en: During the press conference, the President touched on foreign relations.
zh: 在新闻发布会上，总统谈到了对外关系。

en: The reporter shot questions at the politician.
zh: 记者向政客连珠炮似地提出问题。

en: The reporter took down everything that was said.
zh: 记者记录下了所有说过的话。

en: The journalist was too upset to distinguish vice from virtue.
zh: 这位记者太沮丧了，无法区分恶习和美德。

en: We spoke to no purpose.
zh: 我们白说了。

en: We pressed on, regardless.
zh: 我们不顾一切地继续前进。

en: We talked over Jack's plan to put in air conditioning, but could not come to a decision.
zh: 我们讨论了杰克安装空调的计划，但无法做出决定。

en: We talked to each other for a while.
zh: 我们互相聊了一会儿。

en: We often associate black with death.
zh: 我们经常把黑色和死亡联系起来。

en: We often fail to realize the extent to which we depend on others.
zh: 我们常常没有意识到我们在多大程度上依赖他人。

en: We were landed on a lonely island.
zh: 我们被困在一个孤岛上。

en: We must think about these plans in terms of what they would cost.
zh: 我们必须从成本的角度来考虑这些计划。

en: We've gotten into this fixed pattern.
zh: 我们已经陷入这种固定的模式。

en: We were granted the privilege of fishing in this bay.
zh: 我们被授予在这个海湾捕鱼的特权。

en: We've come to the conclusion that this is a true story.
zh: 我们得出的结论是，这是一个真实的故事。

en: We should face up to this issue.
zh: 我们应该面对这个问题。

en: We should approach this problem from different angles.
zh: 我们应该从不同的角度来解决这个问题。

en: We are in agreement on this subject.
zh: 我们在这个问题上达成了一致。

en: We have to somehow come through this troublesome situation.
zh: 我们必须想办法度过这个麻烦的局面。

en: We refer to this city as Little Kyoto.
zh: 我们把这座城市称为小京都。

en: We made fun of him about this.
zh: 我们拿这件事取笑他。

en: We mustn't make too much of this incident.
zh: 我们不能过分强调这件事。

en: We are solidly behind you.
zh: 我们坚定地支持你。

en: We must get over this difficulty.
zh: 我们必须克服这个困难。

en: We've been living here since July.
zh: 我们从七月开始就一直住在这里。

en: We made Mr Grey chairman of the committee.
zh: 我们选举格雷先生为委员会主席。

en: We studied Greek culture from various aspects.
zh: 我们从各个方面研究了希腊文化。

en: We ascribe his success to hard work.
zh: 我们把他的成功归功于努力工作。

en: We had been rival lovers at one time.
zh: 我们曾经是情敌。

en: Tom bats cleanup on our team.
zh: 汤姆是我们队的第四棒。

en: Can you account for why our team lost?
zh: 你能解释一下我们队为什么输了吗？

en: We welcome those who want to join our club.
zh: 我们欢迎那些想加入我们俱乐部的人。

en: The mere sight of a snake makes her sick.
zh: 仅仅看到蛇就让她感到恶心。

en: A swarm of mosquitoes followed him.
zh: 一群蚊子跟着他。

en: I got a lot of mosquito bites.
zh: 我被蚊子咬了很多包。

en: Don't scratch your mosquito bite. It'll get inflamed.
zh: 不要挠蚊子咬的包。它会发炎的。

en: They say that he hates to study.
zh: 他们说他讨厌学习。

en: A mosquito just bit me.
zh: 一只蚊子刚咬了我。

en: What with overwork and poor meals, she fell ill.
zh: 由于过度劳累和饮食不良，她病倒了。

en: What with overwork and lack of nourishment, he became very ill.
zh: 由于过度劳累和营养不良，他病得很重。

en: What with fatigue and lack of sleep, he has fallen ill at last.
zh: 由于疲劳和缺乏睡眠，他终于病倒了。

en: What with overwork and lack of sleep, she has lost her health.
zh: 由于过度劳累和缺乏睡眠，她失去了健康。

en: Fatigue is the natural result of overwork.
zh: 疲劳是过度劳累的自然结果。

en: His health has broken down because of overwork.
zh: 他的健康因为过度劳累而垮掉了。

en: Her eyes have sunk through overwork.
zh: 她的眼睛因为过度劳累而凹陷了。

en: The strain has begun to tell on his health.
zh: 压力开始影响他的健康。

en: Excessive indulgence spoiled the child.
zh: 过度的溺爱宠坏了孩子。

en: The word 'excessive competition' is frequently used in Japanese industry, but there is not a precise definition of the practice.
zh: “过度竞争”这个词在日本工业中经常使用，但对这种做法没有明确的定义。

en: Eating too much fat is supposed to cause heart disease.
zh: 据说吃太多脂肪会导致心脏病。

en: Excessive supply leads to a drop in prices.
zh: 过度供应导致价格下跌。

en: Too much exercise does more harm than good.
zh: 过多的运动弊大于利。

en: The doctor advised me to leave off jogging because it was excessive exercise.
zh: 医生建议我停止慢跑，因为那是过度运动。

en: Too much drinking may be hazardous to your health.
zh: 过度饮酒可能对你的健康有害。

en: I feel terrible about my mistake.
zh: 我对我的错误感到非常难过。

en: A mirror reflects light.
zh: 镜子反射光。

en: Fragments of the mirror were scattered on the floor.
zh: 镜子的碎片散落在地板上。

en: In nostalgic moments we may tend to think of childhood as a time of almost unbroken happiness.
zh: 在怀旧的时刻，我们可能会倾向于认为童年是几乎没有间断的幸福时光。

en: To be an interesting person you have to feed and exercise your mind.
zh: 要想成为一个有趣的人，你必须滋养和锻炼你的头脑。

en: Thank you for your interest.
zh: 感谢您的关注。

en: The phenomenon of interest is in itself, a most interesting subject.
zh: 兴趣这种现象本身就是一个非常有趣的话题。

en: He is not just interested, he's crazy about it.
zh: 他不仅仅是感兴趣，他对它简直是着迷。

en: The excitement reached its peak.
zh: 兴奋达到了顶峰。

en: Her heart was throbbing with excitement.
zh: 她的心激动地跳动着。

en: Getting excited is not at all the same as getting angry.
zh: 兴奋和生气完全不一样。

en: As he grew excited, he spoke more and more rapidly.
zh: 他越兴奋，说话就越快。

en: Excited girls look pretty sometimes.
zh: 兴奋的女孩有时候看起来很漂亮。

en: I was so excited that I could not fall asleep.
zh: 我太兴奋了，以至于睡不着。

en: The excited woman tried to explain the accident all in one breath.
zh: 激动的女人试图一口气解释清楚事故。

en: The excited crowd poured out of the stadium.
zh: 兴奋的人群涌出体育场。

en: The excited audience ran into the concert hall.
zh: 兴奋的观众跑进了音乐厅。

en: When the excitement died down, the discussion resumed.
zh: 当兴奋平息下来时，讨论又重新开始了。

en: A wet blanket is not always unpleasant when you come to know him well.
zh: 当你真正了解他之后，扫兴的人并不总是令人讨厌。

en: A promise given under a threat is worthless.
zh: 在威胁下做出的承诺毫无价值。

en: Don't scare me like that!
zh: 别那样吓我！

en: I'd like you to have a chest X-ray.
zh: 我想让你做个胸部X光检查。

en: With her heart pounding, she opened the door.
zh: 她心跳加速，打开了门。

en: I waited for the curtain to rise with my heart beating in excitement.
zh: 我心怀激动地等待着幕布拉开。

en: Would you like me to massage your chest?
zh: 你想让我给你按摩胸部吗？

en: I have heartburn.
zh: 我烧心。

en: You can read any book that interests you.
zh: 你可以读任何你感兴趣的书。

en: It is not wise to put your money on a horse.
zh: 把钱押在一匹马上是不明智的。

en: Had it not been for your cooperation, I could not have finished the work in time.
zh: 要不是你的合作，我不可能及时完成这项工作。

en: Do you know what you're asking?
zh: 你知道你在要求什么吗？

en: I forbid you to smoke.
zh: 我禁止你吸烟。

en: His argument is more radical than yours.
zh: 他的论点比你的更激进。

en: Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.
zh: 你糟糕的记忆力是由于不良的听力习惯造成的。

en: The sooner you return, the happier your father will be.
zh: 你越早回来，你父亲就越高兴。

en: Leave your desk as it is.
zh: 把你的桌子保持原样。

en: I think your basic theory is wrong.
zh: 我认为你的基本理论是错误的。

en: Your wish will come true in the near future.
zh: 你的愿望在不久的将来会实现的。

en: What's your wish?
zh: 你的愿望是什么？

en: Your eyes remind me of stars.
zh: 你的眼睛让我想起了星星。

en: That is no business of yours.
zh: 那不关你的事。

en: Where is your school?
zh: 你的学校在哪里？

en: How many pupils are there in your school?
zh: 你的学校有多少学生？

en: Your singing puts professional singers to shame.
zh: 你的歌唱让专业歌手都感到羞愧。

en: Your house needs repairing.
zh: 你的房子需要修理。

en: Your house is three times as large as mine.
zh: 你的房子是我的三倍大。

en: What direction does your house face?
zh: 你的房子朝哪个方向？

en: Make a sketch of your house.
zh: 画一张你房子的草图。

en: I wish I could live near your house.
zh: 我希望我能住在你家附近。

en: How many rooms are there in your house?
zh: 你的房子里有多少个房间？

en: Let's meet halfway between your house and mine.
zh: 我们约在你家和我家中间的地方见面吧。

en: How far is it from your house to the park?
zh: 从你家到公园有多远？

en: The magician had the children's attention.
zh: 魔术师吸引了孩子们的注意力。

en: The magician's tricks surprised us.
zh: 魔术师的戏法让我们感到惊讶。

en: Basically, I agree with your opinion.
zh: 基本上，我同意你的意见。

en: Fundamental instincts will not go away.
zh: 基本本能不会消失。

en: The master plan includes programs to provide employment as well as recreation.
zh: 总体规划包括提供就业和娱乐的项目。

en: That game is easy, once you learn the basic rules.
zh: 一旦你学会了基本规则，那个游戏就很简单。

en: On base and off, buckle your seat-belts.
zh: 无论在基地内还是基地外，请系好安全带。

en: I'm keeping a record of basal body temperature.
zh: 我正在记录基础体温。

en: It is important to strengthen the basis.
zh: 加强基础很重要。

en: It is foolish of you to build a castle in the air while forgetting to drive in pilings for its foundation.
zh: 你忘记打地基就想建造空中楼阁，真是太愚蠢了。

en: Don't let your feelings show.
zh: 不要表露你的感情。

en: You could tell by the ear-to-ear grin that came to his face that he really had something to smile about.
zh: 从他脸上露出的笑容可以看出，他真的有值得高兴的事情。

en: I'll be glad to help him.
zh: 我很乐意帮助他。

en: I'm willing to help him.
zh: 我愿意帮助他。

en: We gladly accept your offer.
zh: 我们欣然接受您的提议。

en: I'll be happy to answer your question.
zh: 我很乐意回答你的问题。

en: I'm quite agreeable to doing my duty.
zh: 我非常乐意履行我的职责。

en: I'll be glad to come.
zh: 我很乐意来。

en: I will gladly help you.
zh: 我很乐意帮助你。

en: I thought you'd jump at the chance.
zh: 我以为你会欣然接受这个机会。

en: I'll do it with pleasure.
zh: 我很乐意做这件事。

en: I am glad to accept your invitation.
zh: 我很高兴接受你的邀请。

en: I will be very happy to accept your invitation.
zh: 我非常乐意接受你的邀请。

en: I'll be glad to.
zh: 我很乐意。

en: I'll be only too glad to go with you.
zh: 我非常乐意和你一起去。

en: Show me what you bought.
zh: 给我看看你买了什么。

en: How much is the car you are planning to buy?
zh: 你打算买的那辆车多少钱？

en: I saw you with a tall boy.
zh: 我看见你和一个高个子男孩在一起。

en: He is no more foolish than you are.
zh: 他并不比你更傻。

en: It is amazing that you won the prize.
zh: 你竟然获奖了，真是太令人惊讶了。

en: It's a pity that you should leave Japan.
zh: 你要离开日本，真是太可惜了。

en: I'll take over your duties while you are away from Japan.
zh: 你离开日本期间，我会接替你的工作。

en: I am going to do it whether you agree or not.
zh: 不管你是否同意，我都要去做。

en: I don't object to your going out to work, but who will look after the children?
zh: 我不反对你出去工作，但是谁来照顾孩子呢？

en: I'm very happy you'll be visiting Tokyo next month.
zh: 我很高兴你下个月要来东京。

en: You have good reason to be angry.
zh: 你有充分的理由生气。

en: The success resulted from your efforts.
zh: 成功源于你的努力。

en: We were just talking about you when you called.
zh: 你打电话来的时候，我们正在谈论你。

en: It is difficult for you to climb to the mountaintop.
zh: 你很难爬到山顶。

en: It's quite plain that you haven't been paying attention.
zh: 很明显你一直没有注意听。

en: Your advice led me to success.
zh: 你的建议引导我走向成功。

en: It is a pity that you can't join us.
zh: 你不能加入我们，真是太可惜了。

en: You had better not wake me up when you come in.
zh: 你进来的时候最好不要吵醒我。

en: I sincerely hope that you will soon recover from your illness.
zh: 我衷心希望你早日康复。

en: Unless you make a decision quickly, the opportunity will be lost.
zh: 除非你尽快做出决定，否则机会将会失去。

en: I hope that you will get well soon.
zh: 我希望你早日康复。

en: I found the very thing you had been looking for.
zh: 我找到了你一直在寻找的东西。

en: It is plain that you have done this before.
zh: 很明显你以前做过这件事。

en: I don't care whichever you choose.
zh: 你选哪个我都无所谓。

en: It is not surprising that you should be scolded by your teacher.
zh: 你被老师责骂，这并不奇怪。

en: Even though I felt that there was something strange, I just didn't know what it was.
zh: 虽然我感觉有些奇怪，但我就是不知道是什么。

en: The patient was lying in the bed with his eyes closed.
zh: 病人正闭着眼睛躺在床上。

en: The patient was recovering daily.
zh: 病人每天都在恢复。

en: The patient is steadily recovering.
zh: 病人正在稳定恢复。

en: The patient was discharged from hospital.
zh: 病人已经出院了。

en: The doctor emphasized that the patient had only a few days.
zh: 医生强调病人只有几天时间了。

en: The patient got better little by little.
zh: 病人一点一点地好起来了。

en: The patient is out of danger now.
zh: 病人现在脱离危险了。

en: The patient was allowed up.
zh: 病人被允许起床活动了。

en: The patient will soon recover from his illness.
zh: 病人很快就会康复的。

en: The patient was quite beyond help, so that the doctors could do no more.
zh: 病人已经病入膏肓，医生也无能为力了。

en: Patients often die simply because they yield to their diseases.
zh: 病人常常因为屈服于疾病而死亡。

en: The condition of the patient turned for the better.
zh: 病人的病情好转了。

en: The patient's life was in danger.
zh: 病人的生命有危险。

en: The patient's condition changes from day to day.
zh: 病人的病情每天都在变化。

en: The condition of the patients changes every day.
zh: 病人们的病情每天都在变化。

en: The patient is sick beyond all hope.
zh: 病人病入膏肓，已经没有希望了。

en: Give medicine to the patient right away.
zh: 立刻给病人喂药。

en: I cannot say for certain that the patient will recover.
zh: 我不能确定病人一定会康复。

en: The construction of a highway will contribute to the growth of the suburbs.
zh: 高速公路的建设将有助于郊区的发展。

en: Dried fish is not to my taste.
zh: 我不喜欢吃鱼干。

en: If the hay caught fire, it would be a real disaster.
zh: 如果干草着火，那将是一场真正的灾难。

en: We stored the hay in the barn.
zh: 我们把干草储存在谷仓里。

en: A spontaneous fire started in the hay.
zh: 干草堆里发生了自燃。

en: Try to be generous and forgive.
zh: 试着慷慨一点，原谅别人吧。

en: To our surprise, he scoffed the lot.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，他狼吞虎咽地吃光了。

en: To my surprise, he won the prize.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他赢得了奖品。

en: To our surprise, he was defeated in the match.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，他在比赛中被打败了。

en: To my surprise, they ate the meat raw.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他们生吃了肉。

en: To our surprise, our son has suddenly shot up recently.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，我们的儿子最近突然长高了很多。

en: To my great surprise, we won!
zh: 让我非常吃惊的是，我们赢了！

en: To my surprise, he has failed.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他失败了。

en: To my surprise, the door was unlocked.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，门没锁。

en: To my amazement, it disappeared in an instant.
zh: 让我惊讶的是，它瞬间消失了。

en: To our surprise, she has gone to Brazil alone.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，她独自去了巴西。

en: To my surprise, she spoke English very well.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，她说英语说得非常好。

en: To our surprise, she revived at once.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，她立刻复活了。

en: To my surprise, he got married to a very beautiful actress.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他和一位非常漂亮的女演员结婚了。

en: To my surprise, he failed the examination.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他考试不及格。

en: To my surprise, he refused my offer.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他拒绝了我的提议。

en: To my surprise, he easily came up with a plan.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他轻易地想出了一个计划。

en: To my surprise, he had a beautiful voice.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，他有一副美妙的嗓音。

en: Surprisingly enough, he turned out to be a thief.
zh: 令人惊讶的是，他竟然是个小偷。

en: To my dismay, my wallet was gone.
zh: 让我沮丧的是，我的钱包不见了。

en: Surprisingly, he did his last job in one-third the time it would take me.
zh: 令人惊讶的是，他用我三分之一的时间完成了他的最后一份工作。

en: To our surprise, Tom came to our party with Mary.
zh: 让我们吃惊的是，汤姆和玛丽一起来参加我们的聚会。

en: To my surprise, the noted psychologist was accused of a kidnapping.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，那位著名的心理学家被指控绑架。

en: To my surprise, the anthropologist was accused of murder.
zh: 让我吃惊的是，那位人类学家被指控谋杀。

en: Hasn't he looked at himself in a mirror?
zh: 他难道没照过镜子吗？

en: Don't break a mirror.
zh: 不要打碎镜子。

en: You are home late.
zh: 你回家晚了。

en: It is not my intention to return.
zh: 我无意回去。

en: You're back late. What have you been up to?
zh: 你回来晚了。你一直在做什么？

en: Can you find your way home?
zh: 你能找到回家的路吗？

en: Don't fool around on your way home.
zh: 回家路上别闲逛。

en: Don't play around too much after school.
zh: 放学后别玩太久。

en: I'm fixing the radio which I found on my way home.
zh: 我在修理回家路上捡到的收音机。

en: I caught sight of a parade on my way home.
zh: 我回家路上看到了一场游行。

en: I was caught in a shower on my way home.
zh: 我回家路上淋了雨。

en: The trip back was very comfortable.
zh: 回程非常舒适。

en: Do you have a return ticket to Japan?
zh: 你有回日本的回程票吗？

en: Hopefully you can rest and relax on the flight home.
zh: 希望你能在回家的航班上好好休息放松。

en: Would you mind picking up something on the way back?
zh: 你介意在回来的路上买点东西吗？

en: Please drop in at my house on your way home.
zh: 请在回家路上顺便来我家坐坐。

en: Please drop in on your way home.
zh: 请在回家路上顺便来访。

en: It'd be great if you could pick up some bread before you come home.
zh: 如果你能在回家前买些面包就太好了。

en: I don't wanna go back.
zh: 我不想回去。

en: I'll call by at the post office on the way home.
zh: 我回家路上会顺便去趟邮局。

en: Wait here till I come back.
zh: 在这里等我回来。

en: I will see him after I get back.
zh: 我回来后会去看他。

en: He asked me to wait there until he came back.
zh: 他让我待在那里等他回来。

en: She scolded the child for coming home so late.
zh: 她责骂孩子回家太晚。

en: So nice that you are back.
zh: 你回来了真好。

en: On his return he found her daughter asleep.
zh: 他回来时发现她的女儿睡着了。

en: My bicycle was gone when I returned.
zh: 我回来的时候，我的自行车不见了。

en: Is there a table available for two on Friday?
zh: 请问星期五有两人桌吗？

en: A fiscal tightening policy is being enacted.
zh: 正在实行财政紧缩政策。

en: Interest rates will rise due to monetary tightening.
zh: 由于货币紧缩，利率将会上升。

en: Costs of financial services are rising in every country.
zh: 每个国家的金融服务成本都在上升。

en: The Golden Gate Bridge is made of iron.
zh: 金门大桥是由钢铁制成的。

en: How long is the Golden Gate Bridge?
zh: 金门大桥有多长？

en: He will do anything to make money.
zh: 他会不择手段地赚钱。

en: To make money is not the purpose of life.
zh: 赚钱不是人生的目的。

en: Apart from earning money, I have no interest in real estate.
zh: 除了赚钱，我对房地产没有兴趣。

en: We ran short of money.
zh: 我们的钱不够用了。

en: A blonde is speaking to her psychiatrist.
zh: 一个金发女郎正在和她的心理医生说话。

en: A girl with blonde hair came to see you.
zh: 一个金发女孩来找过你。

en: Kanazawa is a quiet city.
zh: 金泽是一个安静的城市。

en: There are sometimes blizzards in Kanazawa.
zh: 金泽有时会有暴风雪。

en: Metal contracts when cooled.
zh: 金属冷却时会收缩。

en: The acid burned the metal.
zh: 酸烧蚀了金属。

en: Love of money is common to all men.
zh: 爱财是人之常情。

en: I think the love of money is common to us all.
zh: 我认为爱财对我们所有人来说都是人之常情。

en: We should not place too much emphasis on money.
zh: 我们不应该过分强调金钱。

en: Money is not a criterion of success.
zh: 金钱不是成功的标准。

en: Money is the measure of worth.
zh: 金钱是衡量价值的标准。

en: Money is the root of all evil.
zh: 金钱是万恶之源。

en: My financial worries are past.
zh: 我的财务烦恼已经过去了。

en: Take part in the activity not for money but for learning through experience.
zh: 参与这项活动不是为了钱，而是为了通过经验学习。

en: I had a quarrel with him over money.
zh: 我因为钱和他吵了一架。

en: I couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.
zh: 没有你我做不到。谢谢你。

en: Nothing is achieved without effort.
zh: 不付出努力，一事无成。

en: Many people drift through life without a purpose.
zh: 很多人漫无目的地度过一生。

en: Life without love is just totally pointless.
zh: 没有爱的生活毫无意义。

en: Let me know if I need to make any changes.
zh: 如果我需要做任何更改，请告诉我。

en: I think exams are ruining education.
zh: 我认为考试正在毁掉教育。

en: We can't sleep because of the noise.
zh: 我们因为噪音而无法入睡。

en: Do you have a condom?
zh: 你有安全套吗？

en: Do whatever he tells you.
zh: 照他说的做。

en: I can walk to school in 10 minutes.
zh: 我步行10分钟就能到学校。

en: It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.
zh: 我花了两个多小时才翻译了几页英语。

en: It is already eleven.
zh: 已经十一点了。

en: May I talk to Ms. Brown?
zh: 我可以和布朗女士谈谈吗？

en: "Yes, orange juice please," says Mike.
zh: “是的，请给我橙汁，”迈克说。

en: "Ah!" is an interjection.
zh: “啊！”是一个感叹词。

en: What do you want?
zh: 你想要什么？

en: The mandatory character of schooling is rarely analyzed in the multitude of works dedicated to the study of the various ways to develop within children the desire to learn.
zh: 在众多致力于研究如何在儿童内心培养学习欲望的著作中，很少分析学校教育的强制性特征。

en: I have a bone to pick with you.
zh: 我和你有点事要算账。

en: Do you need me to give you some money?
zh: 你需要我给你一些钱吗？

en: Paris is the most beautiful city in the world.
zh: 巴黎是世界上最美丽的城市。

en: Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.
zh: 嘿，我可能没钱，但我还有我的尊严。

en: I have a dream.
zh: 我有一个梦想。

en: This is my friend Rachel. We went to high school together.
zh: 这是我的朋友瑞秋。我们一起上的高中。

en: The cost of life increased drastically.
zh: 生活成本急剧增加。

en: All that which is invented, is true.
zh: 凡是虚构的，都是真实的。

en: All you can do is trust one another.
zh: 你们能做的只有彼此信任。

en: Everyone wants to meet you. You're famous!
zh: 大家都想见你，你太有名了！

en: Why are you sorry for something you haven't done?
zh: 你又没做错事，为什么要道歉？

en: I utterly despise formal writing!
zh: 我极其讨厌正式的写作！

en: Foreign people intrigue me.
zh: 外国人让我觉得很有意思。

en: Whatever I do, she says I can do better.
zh: 无论我做什么，她都说我能做得更好。

en: What keeps you up so late?
zh: 什么事让你这么晚都睡不着？

en: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.
zh: 你会在一周内学到很多东西，这会让你很惊讶。

en: I don't have anyone who'd travel with me.
zh: 我没有能和我一起旅行的人。

en: Life is hard, but I am harder.
zh: 生活很艰难，但我比生活更强硬。

en: Bearing can be unbearable.
zh: 忍受有时是难以忍受的。

en: Stop it! You're making her feel uncomfortable!
zh: 住手！你让她感到不舒服了！

en: Nothing is beautiful but the truth.
zh: 唯有真理才是美的。

en: Tomorrow, he will land on the moon.
zh: 明天，他将登上月球。

en: I don't speak Japanese.
zh: 我不会说日语。

en: This is a pun.
zh: 这是一个双关语。

en: Nobody understands me.
zh: 没有人理解我。

en: I learned to live without her.
zh: 我学会了没有她的生活。

en: It's useless to keep on thinking any more.
zh: 再想下去也没用了。

en: I have too many things on my mind these days.
zh: 这些天我脑子里想的事情太多了。

en: I just wanted to check my email.
zh: 我只是想查一下我的邮件。

en: Do you really need to ask the question to know the answer?
zh: 你真的需要问这个问题才知道答案吗？

en: You can't expect me to always think of everything!
zh: 你不能指望我总是想到所有的事情！

en: I suppose that behind each thing we have to do, there's something we want to do...
zh: 我想，在我们必须做的每件事背后，都有我们想做的事...

en: You really don't have the right priorities!
zh: 你真的没有正确的优先顺序！

en: All of us want prices to decline.
zh: 我们都希望物价下跌。

en: We all wondered why she had dumped such a nice man.
zh: 我们都想知道她为什么会甩掉这么好的男人。

en: We were all rather exhausted.
zh: 我们都相当疲惫。

en: We must all take care to preserve our national heritage.
zh: 我们都必须注意保护我们的民族遗产。

en: All of us devoted ourselves to the development of our country.
zh: 我们都致力于我们国家的发展。

en: We were all amused with the comedy.
zh: 我们都被那部喜剧逗乐了。

en: We all suffer from it to some degree.
zh: 我们都在某种程度上受到它的影响。

en: We all worked at the company by the hour.
zh: 我们都在那家公司按小时工作。

en: We all share the heartfelt wish that he and all the others will pass the admission examination.
zh: 我们都衷心希望他和所有其他人都能通过入学考试。

en: We all pondered over what had taken place.
zh: 我们都反复思考发生了什么事。

en: We face competition from foreign suppliers.
zh: 我们面临着来自外国供应商的竞争。

en: We are comfortably established in our new home.
zh: 我们在新家安顿得很舒服。

en: We gained admittance to the meeting.
zh: 我们获准参加了会议。

en: We should stick to our plan.
zh: 我们应该坚持我们的计划。

en: We are never so happy nor so unhappy as we imagine.
zh: 我们永远不会像我们想象的那样快乐或不快乐。

en: We live in the age of technology.
zh: 我们生活在科技时代。

en: We grew up within our family circle.
zh: 我们在家庭的圈子里长大。

en: We felt the house shake.
zh: 我们感觉到房子在摇晃。

en: We have come to an arrangement with the dealer about the price.
zh: 我们已经和经销商就价格达成协议。

en: We ordered some new books from England.
zh: 我们从英国订购了一些新书。

en: We kept on working for hours without eating anything.
zh: 我们不停地工作了好几个小时，什么也没吃。

en: We should act so as to solve the problem.
zh: 我们应该采取行动来解决问题。

en: We must prevent a war by all possible means.
zh: 我们必须尽一切可能防止战争。

en: We live in a cozy little house in a side street.
zh: 我们住在一条小街上舒适的小房子里。

en: We danced to the music.
zh: 我们随着音乐跳舞。

en: I'd like to discuss the following at the meeting.
zh: 我想在会议上讨论以下内容。

en: At the meeting I pointed out the plan's merit.
zh: 在会议上，我指出了该计划的优点。

en: Her absence went unnoticed until the end of the meeting.
zh: 直到会议结束，她的缺席才被注意到。

en: After the meeting she headed straight to her desk.
zh: 会议结束后，她径直走向她的办公桌。

en: The session will be prolonged again.
zh: 会议将会再次延长。

en: The audience filled the hall.
zh: 观众坐满了大厅。

en: The members numbered thirty, all told.
zh: 总共有三十名成员。

en: All the members were present.
zh: 所有成员都出席了。

en: Each member was called upon.
zh: 每位成员都被点名了。

en: Were all the members present at the meeting?
zh: 所有成员都出席会议了吗？

en: All the members were present at the meeting.
zh: 所有成员都出席了会议。

en: Any member can make use of these facilities.
zh: 任何成员都可以使用这些设施。

en: The members decreased to five.
zh: 成员减少到五个。

en: The members decreased by 50 to 400.
zh: 成员减少了50人，降至400人。

en: Mention each member by name, please.
zh: 请逐一提到每位成员的名字。

en: When did they register the names of the members?
zh: 他们什么时候登记了成员的名字？

en: I absented myself from the meeting.
zh: 我缺席了会议。

en: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
zh: 小别胜新婚。

en: The attendance at the party was larger than had been expected.
zh: 派对的出席人数比预期的要多。

en: The meeting will take place next Monday.
zh: 会议将于下周一举行。

en: The meeting was canceled because of the typhoon.
zh: 会议因台风取消了。

en: The meeting was arranged for next Sunday.
zh: 会议安排在下周日。

en: The meeting came to an end at noon.
zh: 会议在中午结束。

en: The meeting took place yesterday.
zh: 会议昨天举行了。

en: The meeting was canceled because of the rain.
zh: 会议因下雨取消了。

en: Good morning, everybody.
zh: 大家早上好。

en: Be silent in the library, boys.
zh: 同学们，图书馆里请保持安静。

en: Ladies and gentlemen, I would like you to listen to my opinion.
zh: 女士们先生们，我想请大家听听我的意见。

en: All right, everyone, let's not stand on ceremony tonight. Cheers!
zh: 好了，各位，今晚大家不必拘礼，干杯！

en: Look at the blackboard, everyone.
zh: 大家看黑板。

en: Good morning, everyone.
zh: 各位早上好。

en: My best wishes to you and yours.
zh: 祝您和您的家人一切顺利。

en: Speak clearly so that everyone may hear you.
zh: 请说清楚，这样大家都能听见。

en: Everybody took a hostile attitude toward illegal aliens.
zh: 大家对非法移民都抱有敌意。

en: Everyone regarded him as a great singer.
zh: 大家都认为他是一位伟大的歌手。

en: Everybody laughed.
zh: 大家都笑了。

en: Everybody looks up to him.
zh: 大家都尊敬他。

en: Everybody laughed at me.
zh: 大家都嘲笑我。

en: He got angry because he thought that everyone was trying to make a fool of him.
zh: 他很生气，因为他认为大家都在耍他。

en: Everyone looked on me as a leader.
zh: 大家都把我当成领导者。

en: I was happy to find that they agreed to my plan.
zh: 我很高兴发现他们同意我的计划。

en: Everybody blames me for my careless mistake.
zh: 大家都责怪我粗心的错误。

en: We went to the theater early, so we could be sure that everyone could get a seat.
zh: 我们很早就去了剧院，这样我们就能确保每个人都有座位。

en: All of you are familiar with the truth of the story.
zh: 你们都熟悉这个故事的真相。

en: They all looked up to him as their leader.
zh: 他们都把他视为他们的领导者。

en: This meeting is a waste of time. Everybody is just talking in vague theoretical terms.
zh: 这个会议简直是浪费时间。大家都在空谈理论。

en: I broke your ashtray.
zh: 我打碎了你的烟灰缸。

en: I need an ashtray.
zh: 我需要一个烟灰缸。

en: Put the ashtray within eyes reach.
zh: 把烟灰缸放在伸手可及的地方。

en: Throw a sprat to catch a whale.
zh: 抛砖引玉。

en: The cost of operating schools continued to rise.
zh: 学校的运营成本持续上涨。

en: Outside the school, she saw people with no homes living in cardboard boxes.
zh: 在学校外面，她看到无家可归的人住在纸板箱里。

en: As soon as he graduated, he went to work in his father's general store.
zh: 他一毕业就去他父亲的杂货店工作了。

en: Let's skip school and go see the movie.
zh: 我们逃学去看电影吧。

en: Cutting school is the first stage of delinquency.
zh: 逃学是不良行为的第一步。

en: I like summer holidays better than school.
zh: 我喜欢暑假胜过上学。

en: Will you walk down to the school with me?
zh: 你愿意和我一起走到学校吗？

en: The school is only a five-minute walk.
zh: 学校只有五分钟的步行路程。

en: I can walk to school in half an hour.
zh: 我可以在半小时内走到学校。

en: I ran to school, but the bell had already rung.
zh: 我跑到学校，但铃已经响了。

en: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car, but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
zh: 一个从未上过学的人可能会偷一节货车车厢里的东西，但如果他受过大学教育，他可能会偷走整个铁路。

en: The street to school was flooded and we had to go around.
zh: 去学校的路被淹了，我们不得不绕道。

en: Remember to post the letter on your way to school.
zh: 记得在去学校的路上寄信。

en: Don't forget to mail this letter on your way to school.
zh: 别忘了在去学校的路上把这封信寄了。

en: I met her on my way to school.
zh: 我在去学校的路上遇到了她。

en: While crossing the street on my way to school, I met with an accident.
zh: 我在去学校的路上过马路时，遇到了事故。

en: I met Tom on my way to school.
zh: 我在去学校的路上遇到了汤姆。

en: Wash your face before you go to school.
zh: 去上学之前洗脸。

en: He was going to school.
zh: 他正要去学校。

en: Go to school.
zh: 去上学。

en: Can you walk to school, or do you have to take the bus?
zh: 你能走路上学吗，还是你必须坐公共汽车？

en: It takes us half an hour to walk to school.
zh: 我们走路上学要花半个小时。

en: It's a shortcut to the school.
zh: 这是去学校的捷径。

en: Schools were started to help young people prepare for living in the world.
zh: 创办学校是为了帮助年轻人为在世界上生活做好准备。

en: School begins tomorrow.
zh: 学校明天开学。

en: Don't set your failure down to bad luck.
zh: 不要把你的失败归咎于坏运气。

en: You should acknowledge your failure.
zh: 你应该承认你的失败。

en: You must work hard in order not to fail.
zh: 你必须努力工作，才不会失败。

en: You should try to form the habit of using your dictionaries.
zh: 你应该努力养成使用字典的习惯。

en: Do you know how to use a dictionary?
zh: 你知道怎么使用字典吗？

en: You should learn how to use your dictionary.
zh: 你应该学习如何使用你的字典。

en: You are free to go home.
zh: 你可以自由回家。

en: Do you have a room of your own?
zh: 你有自己的房间吗？

en: You should learn to restrain yourself.
zh: 你应该学会克制自己。

en: You should be true to your friends.
zh: 你应该对朋友真诚。

en: You should be ashamed of your ignorance.
zh: 你应该为你的无知感到羞愧。

en: What account can you give of your misbehavior?
zh: 你如何解释你的不良行为？

en: You should try to cut your way.
zh: 你应该努力开辟自己的道路。

en: You must cut down on extra expenses in order to live within your means.
zh: 你必须削减额外的开支，才能量入为出。

en: You should live up to your principles.
zh: 你应该坚持你的原则。

en: You must share your jobs with others.
zh: 你必须与他人分享你的工作。

en: You should attend to your own business.
zh: 你应该管好你自己的事。

en: You must account for your conduct.
zh: 你必须为你的行为负责。

en: You'll have to answer for your behavior.
zh: 你将不得不为你的行为负责。

en: You are responsible for what you do.
zh: 你对你所做的事情负责。

en: You should be responsible for your actions.
zh: 你应该为你的行为负责。

en: You should be ashamed of your conduct.
zh: 你应该为你的行为感到羞愧。

en: You can't afford to neglect your health.
zh: 你不能忽视你的健康。

en: You are at liberty to make use of this room in any way you please.
zh: 你可以随意使用这个房间。

en: You must perform your duty.
zh: 你必须履行你的职责。

en: I'm feeling ill, but I intend to go out anyhow.
zh: 我感觉不舒服，但我还是打算出去。

en: I'm feeling fine now.
zh: 我现在感觉很好。

en: I'm feeling low.
zh: 我感觉很沮丧。

en: I feel refreshed.
zh: 我感觉神清气爽。

en: It is easy to get the cranky man's goat by teasing him.
zh: 戏弄那个脾气暴躁的家伙很容易惹他生气。

en: You have to be patient.
zh: 你必须要有耐心。

en: The generous dentist contributed some two billion yen to charity.
zh: 那位慷慨的牙医向慈善机构捐赠了大约二十亿日元。

en: I think I'm going to faint.
zh: 我觉得我要晕倒了。

en: He gives me the creeps.
zh: 他让我觉得毛骨悚然。

en: The weather bureau says it will rain tonight.
zh: 气象局说今晚会下雨。

en: I don't like girls who put on airs.
zh: 我不喜欢装腔作势的女孩。

en: Try and calm down.
zh: 尽量冷静下来。

en: Everybody loved the simple scholar.
zh: 大家都喜欢那个朴素的学者。

en: Don't change your mind.
zh: 不要改变主意。

en: I understand how you feel.
zh: 我理解你的感受。

en: Speak your mind.
zh: 说出你的想法。

en: I really feel for you.
zh: 我真的很同情你。

en: I know how you feel.
zh: 我知道你的感受。

en: Isn't it a lovely morning?
zh: 今天早上天气真好，不是吗？

en: It was a pleasant day, but there were few people in the park.
zh: 天气很好，但是公园里几乎没有人。

en: For somebody who feels rushed all the time, I sure make slow progress.
zh: 对于一个总是感到时间紧迫的人来说，我的进展确实很慢。

en: Your mind is not occupied with your own affairs.
zh: 你没有专注于你自己的事情。

en: A strange feeling came over me.
zh: 一种奇怪的感觉向我袭来。

en: It's a lovely day.
zh: 今天天气真好。

en: Roll up your sleeves and get busy.
zh: 卷起袖子，开始干活吧。

en: You'd better not go.
zh: 你最好别去。

en: You should make your ideas correspond with reality.
zh: 你应该使你的想法符合实际。

en: You will see a forest of masts in the harbor.
zh: 你会在港口看到一片桅樯林立的景象。

en: Are you happy?
zh: 你快乐吗？

en: You are really full of curiosity, aren't you?
zh: 你真是充满了好奇心，不是吗？

en: You are free to do as you please with your money.
zh: 你可以随意支配你的钱。

en: You've got to learn to hold your tongue.
zh: 你得学会管住自己的嘴。

en: You must do as you are told to do.
zh: 你必须按照吩咐去做。

en: It was careless of you to lose the key.
zh: 你真粗心，竟然把钥匙丢了。

en: You made a wise choice.
zh: 你做了一个明智的选择。

en: You did an excellent job.
zh: 你做得非常出色。

en: Didn't you see a dog pass through the yard?
zh: 你没看见一条狗穿过院子吗？

en: You had better give up smoking for your health.
zh: 为了你的健康，你最好戒烟。

en: You have to turn in the reports on Monday.
zh: 你必须在星期一交报告。

en: You had better leave there on Monday.
zh: 你最好在星期一离开那里。

en: How many times a month do you write home?
zh: 你一个月给家里写几次信？

en: You should do the honorable thing and resign.
zh: 你应该做光荣的事情，辞职。

en: You must make up your mind, and that at once.
zh: 你必须下定决心，而且要立刻下定。

en: You have to account for your absence.
zh: 你必须解释你为什么缺席。

en: How do you account for your absence?
zh: 你怎么解释你为什么缺席？

en: You're off in your reckoning.
zh: 你算错了。

en: You had better call off your plan.
zh: 你最好取消你的计划。

en: You must go through with your plan.
zh: 你必须完成你的计划。

en: You should advocate disarmament.
zh: 你应该倡导裁军。

en: You are the master of your own destiny.
zh: 你是自己命运的主人。

en: You can't go out.
zh: 你不能出去。

en: I feel like going out.
zh: 我想出去。

en: Get out, or you will be sorry.
zh: 滚出去，不然你会后悔的。

en: It seems warm outside.
zh: 外面好像很暖和。

en: It was piercingly cold outside.
zh: 外面冷得刺骨。

en: It was pitch black outside.
zh: 外面一片漆黑。

en: There is a strong wind blowing outside.
zh: 外面风很大。

en: It is cold outdoors. Put on your coat.
zh: 外面很冷，把外套穿上。

en: Come inside because it's cold outside.
zh: 进来吧，因为外面很冷。

en: Since it's cold outside, you'd better put your overcoat on.
zh: 外面很冷，你最好穿上大衣。

en: You should put on a raincoat because it's cold outside.
zh: 你应该穿上雨衣，因为外面很冷。

en: It is getting dark outdoors.
zh: 外面天色渐暗。

en: It is getting dark outside.
zh: 外面天黑了。

en: It is still light outside.
zh: 外面天还亮着。

en: It is dark outside.
zh: 外面很黑。

en: It's very gray outside.
zh: 外面阴沉沉的。

en: It's raining buckets outside.
zh: 外面下着倾盆大雨。

en: It is very cold outside. You'll catch a cold without a coat.
zh: 外面很冷，不穿外套你会感冒的。

en: It is getting lighter outside.
zh: 外面天色渐亮。

en: It's getting dark little by little outside.
zh: 外面一点一点地变黑了。

en: It's like summer outside.
zh: 外面像夏天一样。

en: I feel a chill seeing the blizzard outside.
zh: 看到外面的暴风雪，我感到一阵寒意。

en: I didn't feel like studying because the noise outside was getting on my nerves.
zh: 因为外面的噪音让我心烦，所以我不想学习。

en: I have a spare key to my house hidden outside.
zh: 我有一把备用钥匙藏在外面。

en: Could we have a table outside?
zh: 我们可以坐在外面吗？

en: Karate is an art of unarmed defense.
zh: 空手道是一种徒手防御的艺术。

en: You are hearing things.
zh: 你听错了吧。

en: I saw a flock of birds flying aloft.
zh: 我看到一群鸟在空中飞翔。

en: Where can I get a shuttle bus at the airport?
zh: 在机场哪里可以搭乘机场巴士？

en: I'll drive you to the airport.
zh: 我开车送你去机场。

en: I arranged for a car to meet you at the airport.
zh: 我安排了一辆车在机场接你。

en: May I accompany you to the airport?
zh: 我可以陪你去机场吗？

en: How much will it cost to get to the airport?
zh: 去机场要多少钱？

en: How far is it to the airport?
zh: 到机场有多远？

en: How long do you think it will take to go to the airport?
zh: 你觉得去机场要多久？

en: I'll accompany you to the airport.
zh: 我陪你去机场。

en: Let's stay somewhere with easy airport access.
zh: 我们找一个去机场方便的地方住吧。

en: Where does the airport bus leave from?
zh: 机场巴士在哪里出发？

en: Please tell me how to get to the airport.
zh: 请告诉我怎么去机场。

en: I went to the airport by taxi.
zh: 我坐出租车去了机场。

en: You should allow an hour to go to the airport.
zh: 你应该预留一个小时去机场。

en: I could've met you at the airport.
zh: 我本来可以去机场接你的。

en: The airport was closed because of the fog.
zh: 因为雾，机场关闭了。

en: Where can I get the airport bus?
zh: 在哪里可以搭乘机场巴士？

en: Where do I get an airport bus?
zh: 我在哪里可以搭乘机场巴士？

en: How long does the airport bus take to the airport?
zh: 机场巴士到机场要多久？

en: The airport is close at hand.
zh: 机场就在附近。

en: I prefer a hotel by the airport.
zh: 我更喜欢机场附近的酒店。

en: As soon as he arrived at the airport, he phoned his office.
zh: 他一到机场，就给办公室打了电话。

en: Arriving at the airport, I saw the plane taking off.
zh: 到达机场时，我看到飞机正在起飞。

en: It will be four years before the definite result of beef liberalization emerges.
zh: 牛肉自由化明确结果的出现还需要四年时间。

en: Beef, please.
zh: 请给我牛肉。

en: Have you got any preference between beef and lamb?
zh: 牛肉和羊肉，你有什么偏好吗？

en: You cannot sell the cow and drink the milk.
zh: 你不能卖掉奶牛又喝牛奶（比喻杀鸡取卵）。

en: I raise cattle.
zh: 我养牛。

en: And he chased the cattle, the sheep, and the people out of the temple.
zh: 他把牛、羊和人都赶出了圣殿。

en: A cow is a useful animal.
zh: 牛是有用的动物。

en: The cows were moving very slowly through the long green grass.
zh: 奶牛们在长长的绿草中缓慢地移动。

en: The cows looked big and docile.
zh: 奶牛看起来又大又温顺。

en: Cows live on grass.
zh: 奶牛以草为生。

en: Cattle feed on grass.
zh: 牛以草为食。

en: Cows supply us with many things we need.
zh: 奶牛为我们提供许多我们需要的东西。

en: Cows give us milk.
zh: 奶牛给我们牛奶。

en: Cows provide us with milk.
zh: 奶牛为我们提供牛奶。

en: Cows provide us with good milk.
zh: 奶牛为我们提供优质的牛奶。

en: The cow is anything but bright.
zh: 牛一点也不聪明。

en: Cows are anything but bright.
zh: 牛一点也不聪明。

en: The cow missed being hit by a gnat's whisker.
zh: 这头牛差一点就被蚊子的触须击中。

en: An ox is captured by the horns, a person is bound by his word.
zh: 牛以角被擒，人以言被缚。

en: The cow supplies us with milk.
zh: 奶牛为我们提供牛奶。

en: Cows supply us with milk.
zh: 奶牛为我们提供牛奶。

en: Cows give us milk, and hens eggs.
zh: 奶牛给我们牛奶，母鸡给我们鸡蛋。

en: A cow gives us milk.
zh: 一头奶牛给我们牛奶。

en: Cows are sacred to Hindus.
zh: 牛在印度教徒眼中是神圣的。

en: Cows are more useful than any other animal in this country.
zh: 在这个国家，牛比任何其他动物都更有用。

en: Correct the mistake and return the file to Mr Luxemburg.
zh: 改正错误，然后把文件还给卢森堡先生。

en: It took him only a few minutes to realize his mistakes.
zh: 他只用了几分钟就意识到自己的错误。

en: People who are afraid of making mistakes will make no progress in English conversation.
zh: 害怕犯错误的人在英语会话方面不会取得任何进步。

en: It's absurd never to admit your mistakes.
zh: 从不承认自己的错误是很荒谬的。

en: To err is human, to forgive divine.
zh: 人非圣贤，孰能无过，宽恕他人是神圣的。

en: There is no one but commits errors.
zh: 没有人不犯错误。

en: Let's take the utmost caution against errors.
zh: 让我们采取最谨慎的态度来避免错误。

en: Don't worry about making mistakes.
zh: 别担心犯错误。

en: Don't make a mistake.
zh: 不要犯错。

en: The number of mistakes is ten at most.
zh: 最多有十个错误。

en: Make sure that you arrive at seven o'clock.
zh: 确保你七点钟到达。

en: You better believe it.
zh: 你最好相信它。

en: It's a common mistake.
zh: 这是一个常见的错误。

en: Correct errors, if any.
zh: 如果有错误，请改正。

en: An error was made.
zh: 犯了一个错误。

en: There appears to have been a mistake.
zh: 似乎出现了一个错误。

en: You'd better believe.
zh: 你最好相信。

en: Soon the bath was cool enough for him to get into.
zh: 很快，浴缸里的水就凉到可以让他进去的程度了。

en: Soon the plane begins to move, and then it takes off.
zh: 很快，飞机开始移动，然后起飞。

en: It won't be long before they get married.
zh: 他们很快就要结婚了。

en: The approaching exam, they knew, would be quite easy.
zh: 他们知道，即将到来的考试会很容易。

en: It was not long before the news came.
zh: 不久之后，消息就传来了。

en: The dry season there will set in soon.
zh: 那里的旱季很快就要开始了。

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you soon.
zh: 我期待很快见到你。

en: We are looking forward to seeing you soon.
zh: 我们期待很快见到你。

en: We export various kinds of computers all over the globe.
zh: 我们向全球出口各种电脑。

en: This is an extremely well run company.
zh: 这是一家管理得非常好的公司。

en: Our company decided on flat rate pricing.
zh: 我们公司决定采用统一价格。

en: Our company has a long, long history.
zh: 我们公司有着悠久的历史。

en: We do business with that company.
zh: 我们和那家公司有业务往来。

en: We're thoroughly prepared for the millennium bug.
zh: 我们为千年虫做好了充分的准备。

en: The future of our company is at stake. We have been heavily in the red for the last couple of years.
zh: 我们公司的未来岌岌可危。过去几年我们一直严重亏损。

en: Our company's base is in Tokyo.
zh: 我们公司的总部设在东京。

en: Our sales campaign is successful in a big way.
zh: 我们的销售活动非常成功。

en: This new product of ours is a serious blow to our rival company.
zh: 我们的这款新产品对竞争对手公司是一个沉重的打击。

en: Skim through this pamphlet before you take the examination for our company.
zh: 在参加我们公司的考试之前，请浏览一下这本小册子。

en: Our company's agent in Rio will meet you at the airport.
zh: 我们公司在里约的代理人会在机场接您。

en: Our company has many clients from abroad.
zh: 我们公司有很多来自国外的客户。

en: Our showroom made a hit with young ladies.
zh: 我们的展示厅深受年轻女性的欢迎。

en: You have, no doubt, heard of our company.
zh: 毫无疑问，您听说过我们公司。

en: Parents who beat their children really make my blood boil.
zh: 虐待孩子的父母真让我怒火中烧。

en: Our country must develop its natural resources.
zh: 我们国家必须开发自然资源。

en: We have to defend our country from the foreign aggression.
zh: 我们必须保卫我们的国家免受外国侵略。

en: We must promote commerce with neighboring countries.
zh: 我们必须促进与邻国的贸易。

en: We import coffee from Brazil.
zh: 我们从巴西进口咖啡。

en: The youth of our country is indifferent to politics.
zh: 我们国家的年轻人对政治漠不关心。

en: Our trading companies do business all over the world.
zh: 我们的贸易公司在世界各地开展业务。

en: The pollution of our coasts is very serious.
zh: 我们海岸的污染非常严重。

en: Our school adopted his teaching methods.
zh: 我们学校采用了他的教学方法。

en: Our school has adopted a new teaching method.
zh: 我们学校采用了一种新的教学方法。
